formatDescription: The Magick Image File Format (MIFF) is ImageMagick's own format for storing bitmap images. It stores all metadata known to ImageMagick.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives

internalSignatures.name: Magick Image File Format
internalSignatures.note:
BOF max offset 256: id=ImageMagick[new line]{0-256}:[new line]
Specification: http://www.imagemagick.org/script/miff.php
